application

Class SearchModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.movito.themoviedbapi.AbstractTmdbApi
      • info.movito.themoviedbapi.TmdbSearch
        • application.SearchModule

  • public class SearchModule
extends info.movito.themoviedbapi.TmdbSearch
    This class links with an existing MovieDBAccount object and is used to perform search queries from the database for the current account.
    Since:
    2017-07-07
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joseph Cutino

    • Method Detail

      • searchByMovieTitle

        public info.movito.themoviedbapi.model.core.MovieResultsPage searchByMovieTitle(java.lang.String searchString,
                                                                                boolean adult,
                                                                                int pages)
        Function returns a page of results from the movie database pertaining to the input search string.
        Parameters:
        searchString - Title to search for related movies with.
        adult - Used to keep results within user preference.
        pages - The number of result pages returned.
        Returns:
        searchResults Results found based on the provided criteria.

      • searchByKeyword

        public info.movito.themoviedbapi.TmdbSearch.MultiListResultsPage searchByKeyword(java.lang.String keywordSearchString,
                                                                                 int pages)
        This function will return a list of movies and shows that link with the input keyword search string. Search is only performed on a single keyword. Consider updating search to except and array or ArrayList of keywords to extend search. This constructor creates an exception with a message.
        Parameters:
        keywordSearchString - User provided keyword to search for related titles.
        pages - The number of result pages returned.
        Returns:
        searchResults MultiListResultsPage which includes movies and TV shows.
